mapper.select: select id AS code,modular AS type,modularname AS typeName,detailtype AS detailType,detailtypename AS detailTypeName,workcontent AS content, messagetime AS timestamp,personid AS personCode,readmessage AS isRead FROM t_message where personid=#{personId}
mapper.update: update t_message set readmessage=true WHERE id=#{id}
